app_description: Photo Translator photo text speech translator translates text on the fly. use your phone as a portable translator. Translation in Spanish French German Turkish etc Unlock a World of Multilingual Possibilities with Our Photo Translation App! Photo Translation: Transform your smartphone into a powerful translator with our photo translation feature. Simply snap a picture of any text sign menu or document and watch it magically convert into your desired language. Translate from Camera: Experience real time translation like never before! Point your camera at foreign text and our app will instantly translate it making you feel like a local no matter where you are in the world. Multilingual Magic: Whether you re traveling abroad deciphering foreign documents or connecting with global friends our app supports a multitude of languages ensuring you re never lost in translation. Text Recognition: Need to extract text from an image Our OCR Optical Character Recognition technology can do that too! Easily scan and translate printed or handwritten text. Instant Communication: Break the language barrier and have fluid conversations with people from all corners of the globe. Communicate effortlessly enriching your experiences and forging connections worldwide. Visual Dictionary: Enhance your language skills with our visual dictionary. Discover the meaning of new words through images improving your vocabulary in context. Real time Translation: Our app is designed for fast paced on the go translation. Receive instant translations ensuring you never miss a beat while exploring new places. Mobile Convenience: Experience the convenience of a mobile translation tool that s always at your fingertips. Our app is user friendly making it accessible for travelers students and professionals alike. Unlock the power of communication in your pocket! Download our Photo Translation App now and embark on a journey of seamless language exchange. Experience the world speak the world and understand the world with our Photo Translation App. Break language barriers effortlessly. Get started today! Translator features: Text recognition on photo and in real time Speech recognition in 32 languages Translation on the fly. You do not need to wait until the interlocutor finishes the translation takes place on the fly. Over 30 dictation and translation languages. Spanish English German 99 speech recognition accuracy Recognition of punctuation marks in speech Offline Mode: Dictate and translate into different languages without internet. Voice acting of the translated text. Useful for people with limited hearing. How to use the application: 1. Select the translation language 2. Tap the microphone icon or select a camera and start dictating. 3. The application will recognize your speech and translate on the fly into the desired language Translate from Turkish We use google translate for translation. Supported languages for Speech Recognition and Translation: Arabic Catalan Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Greek Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Malay Norwegian Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Slovak Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish Ukrainian Vietnamese Info: 1. Online speech recognition recognition occurs through an Internet connection and is available for all languages that are available in the application 2. Offline mode speech recognitions at your device. This type of speech recognition is supported by more than 10 languages Terms of Service: https: sites.google.com view itranslate app terms Privacy Policy: https: sites.google.com view itranslate app privacy policy
